About MomentumIQ

MomentumIQ is a platform that uses Federated Learning and cutting edge AI to improve the financial wellness of users and deliver the next generation of AI business products; both without storing user data or large cloud compute. Our consumer product, Scrillionaire, allows users to aggregate their financial data on their device, train AI models locally on their data and generate personalized goals and achievements based on patterns of action theyâ€™ve taken in the past. Our enterprise product leverages the AI models we create for users to create Business Intelligence, Product Development and Market Research products for businesses without sharing user data.
